If you're looking for a powerful and thought-provoking film set during World War II, I would highly recommend "Schindler's List." This movie tells the story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saves over a thousand Jews from the Holocaust. Liam Neeson delivers an outstanding performance as Schindler in this moving and unforgettable film.

Alternatively, if you're interested in a more action-packed and quirky take on World War II, you might enjoy "Inglourious Basterds." Quentin Tarantino directs this film that centers around a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers who plan to assassinate Nazi leaders, complete with some unusual twists and turns involving a theater owner seeking revenge. Brad Pitt and Christoph Waltz both give impressive performances in this exciting and unique movie.
